text: The European University of Social Sciences, or CIVICA, is an alliance of European universities specializing the social sciences. It was established in 2019 and has been funded by the European Commission. == Members == * Hertie School * Sciences Po * IE University * SGH Warsaw School of Economics * Bocconi University * European University Institute * Central European University * Stockholm School of Economics * London School of Economics * National University of Political Studies and Public Administration == References == Category:Social sciences
title: The European University of Social Sciences
